mapper.insert: insert into cfg_page (page_id, code, `name`, `type`, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, sort, del_flag) values (#{pageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update cfg_page set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where page_id = #{pageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select page_id, code, `name`, `type`, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, sort, del_flag from cfg_page where page_id = #{pageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select page_id, code, `name`, `type`, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, sort, del_flag from cfg_page
